page.title: 05TRADE IN CHIPPERFIELD
page.content: {SHOPS & SERVICES}Chipperfield has a sub-Post Office, a good Grocery & General Store, Newsagent, Butcher, Dairy & Barber (limited hours). A former second Grocers now houses a Plumber who also sells fancy goods, a former Radio & T.V. Shop is now a Photographers & Video Library. Our Drapery Store has closed.Three of the shops sell sweets & tobacco. A long established Garden Shop & Nursery & a Builders' Office & Yard are both run by local families. Three Inns serve snack meals (& provide the village's only public toilet facilities). There are three Garages. Two sell petrol and cars. Milk, newspapers & groceries are delivered by local retailers. A Mobile Library visits weekly. Chipperfield has no Doctor's Surgery.
